message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. Let me know if that works for you.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. Considering our product's value and your interest, I propose a price of $115.
